import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();// Navigation links
